p: The estimated result of incidence of dengue was 1.29 (95% CI 0.65–2.56) and malaria was 13.86 (95% CI 6.00–32.01) per 1,000 adult population per year. The preceding month data show the incidence of diarrhoea and pneumonia among under-five children to be 10.3% (95% CI 9.1–11.6) and 7.3% (95% CI 6.3–8.4), respectively ( Table 4).
